translation.HELP_MESSAGE: I will ask you {{gameLength}} multiple choice questions. Respond with the number of the answer. For example, say one, two, three, or four.
translation.REPEAT_QUESTION_MESSAGE: To repeat the last question, say, repeat.
translation.ASK_MESSAGE_START: Would you like to start playing?
translation.HELP_REPROMPT: To give an answer to a question, respond with the number of the answer.
translation.STOP_MESSAGE: Would you like to keep playing?
translation.NO_MESSAGE: Ok, we'll play another time. Goodbye!
translation.TRIVIA_UNHANDLED: Try saying a number between 1 and {{answerCount}}.
translation.HELP_UNHANDLED: Say yes to continue, or no to end the game.
translation.WELCOME_MESSAGE: I will ask you {{gameLength}} questions, try to get as many right as you can. Just say the number of the answer. Are you ready?
translation.GAME_OVER_MESSAGE: You got {{score}} out of {{gameLength}} questions correct. Thank you for playing!
